Welcome to the ECD Tech Wiki

This site will list details of various processes and information on unlocking, flashing, demo removal and other various processes. the aim is to provide a comprehensive and quick to navigate reference for all types of mobile devices.

You can browse to the device you need information on by make and model number or simply search for the device you are working on. should you spot any errors or non working processes please report them here(mail-link)

Quick Answer

A rough guide that will let you know the chances of a device being unlocked or processed based on the OEM
